mapper.update: UPDATE account_member SET member_icon=#{1} WHERE member_id=#{0}
mapper.select: select * from account where id=#{accountId}
SELECT * FROM account_member WHERE account_id=#{accountId} ORDER BY CONVERT(member_name USING gbk) ASC
SELECT * from account_pay where id=#{targetId}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money),0) FROM account_pay_offset WHERE target_pay_id=#{targetId} OR origin_pay_id=#{targetId}

SELECT a.id,account_id,paid_id,receipt_id,money,wait_paid_money,paid_status,receipt_status,a.offset_count,CONCAT(IFNULL(c.nickname,''),'',IFNULL(b.name,'')) AS member_name FROM account_pay AS a LEFT JOIN group_ AS b ON a.paid_id=b.id LEFT JOIN USER AS c ON a.paid_id=c.id WHERE a.account_id=#{accountId} ORDER BY CONVERT(member_name USING gbk) asc

SELECT id as member_id,name AS member_name,icon as member_icon,TRUE is_group FROM group_ WHERE admin_id=#{userId} OR id IN (SELECT member_id FROM account_member WHERE is_group=TRUE AND account_id IN ( SELECT account_id FROM account_member WHERE member_id=#{userId} OR member_id IN (SELECT group_id FROM group_user WHERE user_id=#{userId} UNION SELECT id FROM group_ WHERE admin_id=#{userId})))
UNION
SELECT id as member_id,nickname AS member_name,icon as member_icon,FALSE is_group FROM USER WHERE id IN( SELECT accept_id AS id FROM friend WHERE invite_id=#{userId} UNION SELECT invite_id AS id FROM friend WHERE accept_id=#{userId})

#查询所有待付款(指定另一个人),抵消账单专用,会排除当前计算的target SELECT p.number-r.number AS number FROM(SELECT 0 id, IFNULL(SUM(wait_paid_money),0) AS number FROM account_pay AS a WHERE wait_paid_money>0 AND id!=#{targetId} AND a.paid_id=#{user1Id} AND a.receipt_id=#{user2Id}) p LEFT JOIN (SELECT 0 id,IFNULL(SUM(wait_paid_money),0) AS number FROM account_pay AS a WHERE wait_paid_money>0 AND id!=#{targetId} AND a.paid_id=#{user2Id} AND a.receipt_id=#{user1Id}) r ON p.id=r.id

#查询最初始的一个待付大于0的PayTarget SELECT * FROM account_pay AS p LEFT JOIN account AS a ON p.account_id=a.id WHERE wait_paid_money>0 AND p.id!=#{targetId} AND p.paid_id=#{user1Id} AND p.receipt_id=#{user2Id} ORDER BY a.date_timestamp,a.create_timestamp ASC LIMIT 0,1

#查询抵消记录列表,原始记录
SELECT * from account_pay_offset where target_pay_id =#{payId} or origin_pay_id=#{payId}

#查询抵消记录列表,包装好的数据
SELECT c.id,c.type,c.name,c.paid_in,c.date_timestamp,d.icon AS paid_icon,e.icon AS receipt_icon,b.money,a.money AS offset_money FROM account_pay_offset AS a LEFT JOIN account_pay AS b ON a.origin_pay_id=b.id LEFT JOIN account AS c ON b.account_id=c.id LEFT JOIN USER AS d ON b.paid_id=d.id LEFT JOIN USER AS e ON b.receipt_id=e.id WHERE target_pay_id=#{payId} UNION SELECT c.id,c.type,c.name,c.paid_in,c.date_timestamp,d.icon AS paid_icon,e.icon AS receipt_icon,b.money,a.money AS offset_money FROM account_pay_offset AS a LEFT JOIN account_pay AS b ON a.target_pay_id=b.id LEFT JOIN account AS c ON b.account_id=c.id LEFT JOIN USER AS d ON b.paid_id=d.id LEFT JOIN USER AS e ON b.receipt_id=e.id WHERE origin_pay_id=#{payId}

#查询全部待付款(自己)---------------------------- SELECT 'wait_paid' NAME,SUM(wait_paid_money) AS number,COUNT(*) AS count FROM account_pay AS a LEFT JOIN account AS b ON a.account_id=b.id WHERE a.wait_paid_money>0 AND a.paid_id=#{userId}
UNION
#查询全部待收款(自己)---------------------------- SELECT 'wait_receipt' NAME,SUM(wait_paid_money) AS number,COUNT(*) AS count FROM account_pay AS a LEFT JOIN account AS b ON a.account_id=b.id WHERE a.wait_paid_money>0 AND a.receipt_id=#{userId}
UNION
#查询月总支出(自己)---------------------------- SELECT 'month_paidin' NAME,SUM(money) AS number,SUM(_count) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT SUM(paid_in) AS money,COUNT(*) AS _count FROM account WHERE is_private=1 AND TYPE!='sr' AND user_id=#{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(date_timestamp,'%Y-%m')
UNION #多人账单中的应付(去除还款和借款的账单) SELECT SUM(a.should_pay) AS money,COUNT(*) AS _count FROM account_member AS a LEFT JOIN account AS b ON a.account_id=b.id WHERE member_id=#{userId} AND b.type!='hk' AND b.type!='jk' AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(date_timestamp,'%Y-%m')
#还款账单中是付款者的账单(还款中的paid_id是还钱者,出钱的,与借款刚好相反) UNION SELECT SUM(wait_paid_money) AS money,COUNT(*) AS _count FROM account_pay AS a LEFT JOIN account AS b ON a.account_id=b.id WHERE b.type='hk' AND a.paid_id=#{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(date_timestamp,'%Y-%m')
#借款账单中自己是借款者的账单(借款中的receipt_id指的是被借人,出钱的) UNION SELECT SUM(wait_paid_money) AS money,COUNT(*) AS _count FROM account_pay AS a LEFT JOIN account AS b ON a.account_id=b.id WHERE b.type='jk' AND a.receipt_id=#{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(date_timestamp,'%Y-%m'))AS total
UNION
#查询月总收入(自己)---------------------------- SELECT NAME,SUM(number) AS number,SUM(COUNT) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT 'month_sr' NAME,SUM(paid_in) AS number,COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM account WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND TYPE='sr' AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(date_timestamp,'%Y-%m')
UNION
SELECT 'month_jk' NAME,SUM(wait_paid_money) AS number,COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM account_pay AS a LEFT JOIN account AS b ON a.account_id=b.id WHERE b.type='jk' AND a.paid_id=#{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(date_timestamp,'%Y-%m') )AS temp
UNION
#查询所有待完善的账单----------------- SELECT 'wait_edit' NAME,COUNT(*) AS number,0 FROM account_pay AS a LEFT JOIN account AS b ON a.account_id=b.id WHERE (a.paid_id IN (SELECT group_id FROM group_user WHERE user_id=#{userId}) AND a.paid_status=1) OR (a.receipt_id IN (SELECT group_id FROM group_user WHERE user_id=#{userId}) AND a.receipt_status=1)

#查询当日总支出(自己)---------------------------- SELECT 'day_paidin' NAME,SUM(money) AS number,SUM(_count) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT SUM(paid_in) AS money,COUNT(*) AS _count FROM account WHERE is_private=1 AND TYPE!='sr' AND user_id=#{userId} AND TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(date_timestamp)
UNION #多人账单中的应付(去除还款和借款的账单) SELECT SUM(a.should_pay) AS money,COUNT(*) AS _count FROM account_member AS a LEFT JOIN account AS b ON a.account_id=b.id WHERE member_id=#{userId} AND b.type!='hk' AND b.type!='jk' AND TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(date_timestamp)
#还款账单中是付款者的账单(还款中的paid_id是还钱者,出钱的,与借款刚好相反) UNION SELECT SUM(wait_paid_money) AS money,COUNT(*) AS _count FROM account_pay AS a LEFT JOIN account AS b ON a.account_id=b.id WHERE b.type='hk' AND a.paid_id=#{userId} AND TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(date_timestamp)
#借款账单中自己是借款者的账单(借款中的receipt_id指的是被借人,出钱的) UNION SELECT SUM(wait_paid_money) AS money,COUNT(*) AS _count FROM account_pay AS a LEFT JOIN account AS b ON a.account_id=b.id WHERE b.type='jk' AND a.receipt_id=#{userId} AND TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(date_timestamp))AS aaa
UNION
#查询当日涉及到自己的账单数------------------------- SELECT 'day_paid_count' NAME,SUM(a) number,SUM(a) COUNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS a FROM account WHERE is_private=1 AND TYPE!='sr' AND user_id=#{userId} AND TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(date_timestamp) UNION SELECT COUNT(*) AS a FROM account_member AS a LEFT JOIN account AS b ON a.account_id=b.id WHERE member_id=#{userId} AND TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(date_timestamp))AS bbb
